page.title: 11SAWMILL
page.content: My partner and I went to Durley sawmill for an interview with one of the owners.Then we asked him our questions.They only buy their wood from places like forests.They have a total of 35-40 workers.The workers come to work at 7.30am and leave at 4.30pm.They supply their wood to fencers, the Coal Board and they make fences and wooden palets.Their only site is at Durley.Most of the workers live in a six mile radius.They deliver their wood but usually hire a firm to deliver for them.They deal in English Hard and Soft wood.They deliver to a 150 mile radius.Every year theyhandle a total of 4000 tons.They use a computer to keep the records.
